revisions.rev:
{{wiktionarypar|yarrow}} '''Yarrow''' may refer to:
* The [[Yarrow]] herb * [[Yarrow (novel)|''Yarrow'' (novel)]], novel by Charles de Lint * [[Yarrow algorithm]] in cryptography, a random number generator * [[water-tube boiler|Yarrow boiler]] * [[Yarrow Shipbuilders]] in Glasgow, Scotland * [[The Dowie Dens of Yarrow]], a traditional Scottish folk song * A codename for the [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora Core]] 1 Linux distribution
;Places * [[Yarrow, British Columbia]], Canada * [[Yarrow, Northumberland]], England * [[Yarrow, Scottish Borders]], Scotland * [[Yarrowford]] * [[Yarrow, Somerset]], England * [[Yarrow Point, Washington]]
;Rivers * The [[Yarrow Water]], Scotland * The [[River Yarrow (Lancashire)]], England
;Stadium *[[Yarrow Stadium]]
;Media and entertainment * [[The Yarrow]], an indie rock band from Provo, Utah
;People * Sir [[Alfred Yarrow]] (1842â1932), British shipbuilder * [[H. C. Yarrow|Henry Crecy Yarrow]] (1840â1929) American naturalist, ornithologist, and surgeon * [[Peter Yarrow]] (born 1938), an American singer and member of the group Peter, Paul and Mary * [[Alder Yarrow]], an American wine journalist and restaurant critic
;Ships * {{USS|Yarrow|SP-1010}}, a United States Navy patrol boat in commission from 1917 to 1919
